Advanced Features in Rental Copiers

June 25, 2025 Marga Enterprises

Advanced Features in Rental Copiers: What You Should Know Before You Rent

When it comes to modern office equipment, rental copiers are no longer just about making black-and-white copies. Today’s machines are packed with advanced features that improve efficiency, enhance document security, reduce environmental impact, and streamline workflows. Whether you’re running a small startup or managing a large enterprise, understanding the advanced features in rental copiers can help you choose the right machine and get the most value from your rental agreement.

In this article, we’ll explore the key advanced features in rental copiers, why they matter for your business, and how they contribute to smarter, more sustainable operations.

Why Advanced Copier Features Matter

Technology has changed the way we work. Offices now demand speed, flexibility, and data security—all without increasing overhead costs. That’s where advanced features in rental copiers come in. Instead of settling for basic print and scan functions, businesses now look for:

  • Faster and more accurate document handling

  • Integration with cloud storage and networks

  • Enhanced security protocols

  • Eco-friendly printing options

  • Detailed usage tracking for better cost control

These features are particularly important for companies renting copiers, as they get access to high-end technology without the upfront cost of purchasing equipment.

1. Cloud and Network Integration

One of the most in-demand features today is cloud connectivity. Many advanced copiers now allow users to print or scan directly from cloud platforms like Google Drive, Dropbox, and Microsoft OneDrive.

Benefits:

  • Remote access to documents

  • No need for flash drives or email attachments

  • Faster collaboration in hybrid or remote work setups

You can also integrate your copier into your office network, enabling team members to send print jobs from their own devices, whether they’re using a desktop or mobile phone.

2. High-Speed Scanning and Duplex Printing

Speed matters in business. That’s why many rental copiers now include high-speed scanning (often up to 100 pages per minute) and automatic duplex printing (double-sided printing). These features save both time and paper.

Benefits:

  • Increased productivity

  • Reduced paper consumption

  • Lower overall operating costs

Fast document handling is especially useful in events or high-volume situations. If you're considering copier rental for events, high-speed functionality becomes even more essential.

3. Advanced Security Features

Modern copiers handle sensitive data—client records, invoices, contracts. That’s why document security is now a top priority. Look for rental copiers with features such as:

  • User authentication via PIN or ID card

  • Data encryption

  • Secure print release (only the authorized user can retrieve the document)

  • Auto-deletion of stored files after printing

According to this guide on enhancing security with rented copiers, secure document handling reduces the risk of data leaks and ensures compliance with privacy regulations like GDPR or HIPAA.

4. Touchscreen User Interface and Customizable Shortcuts

Forget clunky buttons—today’s copiers often feature intuitive touchscreens that resemble tablets. These allow users to:

  • Customize workflows

  • Set quick-access shortcuts

  • Preview scans before printing

  • Choose specific output settings with ease

These interfaces make the copier more user-friendly, reducing training time for new employees and increasing overall efficiency.

5. Eco-Friendly Features

Sustainability is no longer optional. Many businesses are actively seeking eco-conscious solutions, including in their printing practices. The latest rental copiers now include:

  • Toner-saving modes

  • Automatic sleep functions

  • Recycled components

  • Energy-efficient certifications (e.g., ENERGY STAR®)

By choosing a machine with eco-friendly features, you’re not only reducing your carbon footprint but also potentially lowering electricity and consumable costs.

Learn more about sustainability practices in copier rental and how your business can make greener choices.

6. Analytics and Usage Reporting

Tracking how your copier is used can reveal valuable insights. Advanced rental copiers offer built-in analytics dashboards that let you monitor:

  • Number of prints per user or department

  • Color vs. black-and-white usage

  • Peak usage times

  • Supply consumption

These reports can help you allocate printing resources more effectively and avoid overuse. Some systems even allow automated alerts when toner is low or maintenance is required.

7. Workflow Automation

Many copiers now support workflow automation, reducing manual steps for repetitive tasks. For example, you can:

  • Set scanned invoices to auto-forward to accounting

  • Configure document filing to specific folders based on keywords

  • Send multi-destination scans (email + cloud + backup) in one click

Automating document workflows increases consistency and frees up time for more valuable work.

Discover more on how this improves your team’s performance in this helpful post on the impact of copier rental on workflow.

8. Mobile Printing Compatibility

With mobile-first work habits, compatibility with smartphones and tablets is essential. Many modern copiers support:

  • Apple AirPrint

  • Google Cloud Print

  • QR code or NFC tap-to-print access

  • Proprietary mobile apps

This enables team members and guests to print directly from their devices without needing to install drivers or transfer files manually.

9. Built-In Finishing Options

For organizations that produce booklets, reports, or marketing materials in-house, having finishing features like stapling, hole punching, folding, and booklet-making can make a big difference.

These finishing options eliminate the need for outsourcing and ensure faster turnaround times on documents.

10. Flexible Insurance and Rental Packages

While features are important, don’t overlook the value of comprehensive rental plans. Some copier rental providers offer packages that include:

  • Full insurance coverage

  • Free maintenance and support

  • Toner and parts replacement

  • Flexible upgrades during contract

If you're looking into copier rentals, understanding your copier rental insurance options ensures you’re protected from unexpected breakdowns or damage.

Conclusion: Rent Smarter with the Right Features

Choosing the right copier rental isn't just about price—it's about functionality, efficiency, and future-readiness. When you understand the advanced features in rental copiers, you’re better equipped to select a solution that meets your unique needs while supporting long-term growth and sustainability.

Take time to assess which features align with your operations, whether it’s enhanced security, mobile compatibility, or green printing. And always partner with a reputable provider who offers flexible plans and excellent support.

Ready to upgrade your office productivity? Explore feature-rich copier rental solutions tailored for modern businesses by visiting Marga Copier Rental.
